company.name: TechPotato Softwares
company.description: A founder-led software studio building AI-powered web & mobile apps. Startup-friendly pricing. No corporate BS.

hero.headline: Build Smarter Software
hero.subtitle: A founder-led software studio building AI-powered web & mobile apps. We turn your ideas into scalable products with startup-friendly pricing and direct founder access.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We are a founder-led software studio dedicated to building innovative technology solutions with AI at the core.

story.title: Our
paragraphs: We started TechPotato because we saw too many businesses getting overcharged for mediocre software. Big agencies with big promises and bigger invoices.
We're different. Small team. Direct access to developers. No account managers, no middlemen — just skilled people who care about your project and your success.

values.title: Our Mission
values.description: To empower startups and SMBs with AI-powered technology solutions that drive growth without breaking the bank.

values.title: Our Team
values.description: A small but mighty team of full-stack developers, designers, and AI enthusiasts passionate about building products that matter.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Quality over quantity. Transparency over hidden costs. Partnership over transactions. Your success is our portfolio.

team.name: Dipti Chate
team.bio: Visionary tech entrepreneur with a passion for building innovative software solutions that empower businesses.

services.title: Web Applications
services.description: Custom web apps built with React, Node.js, and modern frameworks. Fast, scalable, and user-friendly solutions for your business.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.description: iOS and Android apps that users love. Native performance with cross-platform efficiency to reach all your customers.

services.title: AI Integration
services.description: Add AI capabilities to your applications. Chatbots, content generation, image recognition, and smart automation powered by modern AI.

services.title: MVP Development
services.description: Turn your idea into a working product fast. Perfect for startups validating their concept and getting to market quickly.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Beautiful interfaces that convert. User research, wireframes, and pixel-perfect designs that make your product stand out.

services.title: Maintenance & Support
services.description: Keep your software running smoothly. Bug fixes, updates, performance optimization, and 24/7 monitoring.

portfolio.title: AI-Powered E-Commerce App
portfolio.description: Cross-platform shopping app with AI-powered product recommendations, smart search, and seamless checkout experience.
portfolio.challenge: Client needed to launch before festival season with a limited budget but wanted AI-powered personalization features.
portfolio.solution: Built with React Native for fast cross-platform delivery. Integrated OpenAI for smart product search and personalized recommendations.

portfolio.title: Healthcare Appointment Platform
portfolio.description: Complete appointment booking and patient management system with video consultations and automated reminders.
portfolio.challenge: High patient no-show rates were hurting clinic revenue. Existing systems were outdated and not mobile-friendly.
portfolio.solution: Built a modern scheduling platform with SMS/WhatsApp reminders, video consultations, and a mobile-first patient portal.

portfolio.title: Business Analytics Dashboard
portfolio.description: Real-time business intelligence dashboard with AI-powered insights, custom reports, and data visualization.
portfolio.challenge: Client was spending hours creating manual reports. Needed real-time insights with AI-powered analysis.
portfolio.solution: Developed a dashboard with automated data pipelines, AI-generated insights, and customizable report templates.

testimonials.name: Rahul Sharma
testimonials.text: TechPotato delivered our MVP in just 6 weeks. The quality exceeded our expectations and the founder's direct involvement made all the difference. Highly recommended for startups!

testimonials.name: Priya Patel
testimonials.text: Working with TechPotato felt like having an in-house team. They understood our vision, suggested AI features we hadn't thought of, and delivered a product our users love.

testimonials.name: Amit Kumar
testimonials.text: The AI integration they built for our e-commerce platform increased conversions by 25%. Fast communication, transparent pricing, and excellent technical skills.

faq.question: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer: Most MVPs take 4-8 weeks. Full applications range from 8-16 weeks depending on complexity. We provide detailed timeline estimates during our free consultation.

faq.question: What's your pricing model?
faq.answer: We offer flexible pricing: fixed-price for MVPs, time & materials for ongoing work, and dedicated team arrangements for larger projects. Startup-friendly rates with no hidden costs.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer maintenance packages including bug fixes, updates, monitoring, and feature additions. We don't disappear after launch.

faq.question: Can you add AI to my existing application?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in AI integration. Whether it's adding chatbots, smart search, content generation, or automation — we can enhance your existing app with AI capabilities.

careers.headline: We're Growing!
careers.description: Looking for passionate developers to join our journey. React, Node.js, React Native experience preferred.

footer.description: A founder-led software studio building AI-powered web & mobile apps. Startup-friendly pricing. Direct founder access on every project.
